---
title: "Are Growth-Mindset Interventions Effective?"
---

*This article is a stub.*
*Do not hesitate to substantiate.*

Growth-Mindset interventions try to increase the academic motivation of students by explaining that hard work pays, mainly by detailong how the brain is like a muscle, and needs to be trained.

The most recent (to our knowledge) meta-analysis of the impact of growth-mindset interventions can be found [here](https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/abs/10.1177/0956797617739704?journalCode=pssa&).
